profile.primary_concern: worry about the side effects and whether PrEP will interact with my medication for schizophrenia

context: As a 30-year-old woman living with schizophrenia, I often feel anxious about new medications. My mental health condition makes me cautious about any changes to my treatment plan. I'm concerned that starting PrEP could lead to complications or worsen my symptoms. The stigma around both my mental illness and HIV prevention makes me hesitant to discuss this with healthcare providers.
example_questions_clean: What are the common side effects of PrEP and how might they affect my mental health?
Can PrEP interact with my medication for schizophrenia?
How can I talk to my doctor about starting PrEP without feeling judged?
Are there support groups for people like me who are considering PrEP?
What resources are available for low-income individuals seeking PrEP?
